animeDescription: In the year 3195, there was a war between an army of robots and the humans. When Shaian, a sentient combat armor, lost his companion in battle, he shut down until his internal systems spotted a new human. It's now almost a 1000 years later, and Shaian's greatest enemy is still alive and doing battle in Brazil. With a new friend`s help, Shaian may be able to stop this evil force before another war rages over the continent.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Kobayashi Makoto', ['Director', 'Original Creator']], ['Kobayashi Osamu', ['Storyboard', 'Color Setting', 'Mechanical Design', 'Key Animation']], ['Ohira Shinya', ['Animation Director', 'Key Animation']], ['Hirano Toshiki', ['Character Design']]]
